title: 游戏版本更新出错，求大佬帮忙看看如何解决
author: Wufeiling
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Wufeiling 于 2019-1-22 19:45 编辑 

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  JechCore (Auxaff [拼音搜索—JustEnoughCharacters] 1.12.0-2.3.2.jar)
  CorePlugin (Aux [平滑字体—SmoothFont] 1.12.2-1.15.jar)
  EnderCorePlugin (Pre [末影前置—EnderCore] 1.12.2-0.5.43.jar)
  CoreModLoader (Aux [3D声效—Sound-Physics] 1.12.2.jar)
  Do not report to Forge! Remove FoamFixAPI (or replace with FoamFixAPI-Lawful) and try again. (Aux [泡沫修复—foamfix] 0.9.9.1-1.12.2-anarchy.jar)
  LoadingPlugin (Bea [菜单资源加载器—ResourceLoader] MC1.12.1-1.5.3.jar)
  MZZLoadingPlugin (Aux [启动加速—MakeZoomZoom] 0.0.4.jar)
  Inventory Tweaks Coremod (Aux [R键整理—InventoryTweaks] 1.63.jar)
  CoreMod (Pre [存档备份前置—Aroma1997Core] 1.12.2-2.0.0.0.b148.jar)
  CoreModBase (Aux [查看潜影盒—ShulkerBoxViewer] 1.5-mc[1.11-1.12.2].jar)
  IELoadingPlugin (ImmersiveEngineering-core-0.12-85.jar)
  AstralCore (Mag [星辉魔法—AstralSorcery] 1.12.2-1.10.1.jar)
  ForgePlugin (Aux [皮肤补丁—CustomSkinLoader] Forge-14.7.jar)
  AppleCore (Pre [苹果核—AppleCore] mc1.12.2-3.1.3.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// Uh... Did I do that?

Time: 1/22/19 7:33 PM
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail
